children.name: zeddSentMe
children.text: Zedd sent me. Something about this gold ingot I have?
children.response: Oh, that. It sounds like he wants you to head to the abandoned mines.

children.name: abandonedMines
children.response: Well, that's what everyone ELSE calls them. The mines were in my family for decades, until we just couldn't keep them up anymore. Thought about selling, but no one was buying.

children.name: sorry
children.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Do you know why Zedd would send me this way?
children.response: Zedd likes to say things. But you're welcome to head down there anyway. I doubt there's anything left. What we didn't retrieve on our own has likely long since been looted by theives.

children.name: where
children.response: Just north of here. You can't miss it.

entries.name: stranger
entries.text: Hello, traveller. If you're weary, I would recommend some R&R up at Old Zedd's.
